rules_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a stun counter on target creature.
{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
When this artifact is put into a graveyard from play, return it to the battlefield with a finality counter.
